articles.content: WhatsApp is soon expected to add multi-device support. The feature has already been spotted on the Android version and now it has made an appearance on the iOS beta version too. In case you are unawa… [+1443 chars]

articles.author: Jaspreetsingh Mankoo
articles.title: Poco M3 Now Available for Sale in India via Flipkart, Check Offers Here - LatestLY
articles.description: Poco M3 smartphone is now available for sale in India. The device was launched in the country last week as the successor to the Poco M2 phone. Poco M3 features a 6.53-inch FHD+ display with a resolution of 2340x1080 pixels.
articles.content: Poco M3 smartphone is now available for sale in India. The device was launched in the country last week as the successor to the Poco M2 phone. The handset is listed on the e-commerce website Flipkart… [+1937 chars]
